title: How do I view my phone's data service status or disable the data service?
answer:
Flick down from the status bar to open the notification panel. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111731) indicates that the mobile network is turned on. To turn off the mobile network, touch this icon to make it become ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111732). 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111733) indicates that the mobile network is turned off. To turn on the mobile network, touch this icon to make it become ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111734).
